primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
1. Wire Transfer service allows you to send large deposits electronically, without any limits on the amount or frequency.

  2. Timeframe: Wire Transfers typically are deposited to us within 0–1 business days of being sent. We deposit these when we receive them throughout the day.

  3. Limit: Wire Transfers are subject to your financial institution’s processing times and are only sent & received during business days (Monday – Friday, excluding holidays). Any wire transfers made to NDAX on a non-business day will be processed and sent out to us by your financial institution on the next available business day.

  4. Your NDAX CAD Wallet has a monthly deposit limit of C$10,000,000.00. This limit is reset at the end of every month and includes the sum of all deposits from our available funding methods; Interac e-Transfers, wire transfers, and bank drafts.

  5. Fees: NDAX does not charge deposit fees.
